agents.usage: It will show details regarding a given Valorant Agent on the basis of choosen agent.

link.usage: Link to Valorant account to get different stats

maps.usage: Sends an image of Map on the basis of choosen map in options.

profile.usage: Get your in-game account datas like level, region, player-ID etc. But make sure you need to use `/link` before using this command

rank.usage: Get your in-game MMR datas like rank, MMR-changed in last game, tier etc. But make sure you need to use `/link` before using this command

recent.usage: Get the leaderboard of your last competitive match along with some stats. But make sure you need to use `/link` before
